summary.p: Returns the statistical variance of the specified expression in a group. NULL values are ignored.

param.name: value
param.p: An expression to determine the statistical variance for.

returns.p: The statistical variance of all evaluated values of expression in a group. NULL values are ignored.

remarks.p:
The VAR aggregate function is limited to the following data types:
byte
sbyte
short
ushort
int
uint
long
ulong
decimal
float
double
